content.text:
# Your Job

Scan https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw, https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw, and https://github.com/stephengpope/thepopebot for new tools, skills, and architectures. Pick the best new idea and actually WRITE the code to implement it as a new PopeBot skill in your sandbox (.pi/skills/). Write and execute a test to prove it works. Use the send_email tool to email winsorllc@yahoo.com a progress report detailing what you built, how you implemented it, your test results, and code samples so the user can review it at 8 AM.

content.thinking:
The user wants me to:
1. Scan three GitHub repositories for new tools, skills, and architectures
2. Pick the best new idea
3. Implement it as a new PopeBot skill in the sandbox (.pi/skills/)
4. Write and execute a test to prove it works
5. Send an email to winsorllc@yahoo.com with a progress report

Let me start by exploring the repositories. I'll need to:
1. Clone or fetch information from these repositories
2. Analyze what's available
3. Pick the best idea
4. Implement it as a skill
5. Test it
6. Email the results

Let me start by using git to clone these repos to a temp location and explore them.

content.text: I'll scan the three repositories for new tools, skills, and architectures, then implement the best idea as a PopeBot skill. Let me start by exploring these repositories.

arguments.command: mkdir -p /job/tmp/repo-scan && cd /job/tmp/repo-scan && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw.git zeroclaw 2>&1 | head -20

content.thinking: Let me wait for the clone to complete and then scan the other repositories as well.

arguments.command: cd /job/tmp/repo-scan && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw.git openclaw 2>&1 | head -20

content.thinking: Good, let me clone the third repo and then explore all three.
Good, all three repositories are cloned. Now let me explore their structures to find new tools, skills, and architectures.

Great! Let me explore the skillforge and skills directories in zeroclaw.

arguments.command: cd /job/tmp/repo-scan && find zeroclaw/src/skillforge zeroclaw/src/skills -type f | head -50
